f2f7670b-a7a3-4a6a-8fac-bfb7079b63b5.name: Ops. VM Uptime (%)
f2f7670b-a7a3-4a6a-8fac-bfb7079b63b5.formula: ${this, metric=sys|poweredOn}  * ceil( min([ max([                   ${this, metric=sys|osUptime_latest} ,                    ${this, metric=sys|heartbeat_latest} ,                    ${this, metric=mem|active_average} ,                   ${this, metric=virtualDisk:Aggregate of all instances|commandsAveraged_average} ,                   ${this, metric=net|transmitted_average}                   ])             , 1          ])     ) * Min([ 300 , ${this, metric=sys|osUptime_latest}]) / 3
